metadata.title: Tab for #TeamSeas - Home
metadata.ogTitle: Remove trash from the seas for free | Tab for #TeamSeas
metadata.ogDescription: Open browser tabs to clean our seas, for free. It's that easy. Join #teamseas today!
metadata.causeSpecificKeywords: charity, seas, TeamSeas, teamseas, #teamseas, ocean, oceans, sharks, whales, dolphins, fish, environment, global warming, river, rivers, lake, lakes, pollution, extension, new tab, chrome, help, donation, raise money, money, easy, ways to donate, free, best, home, youtube, safe, volunteer, internet, tab for a cause, impact, legitimate, food, facebook, twitter, reddit, instagram, tumblr

landing.title: The easiest way to save our seas
landing.subtitle: Every tab opened raises money for #TeamSeas, an internet-led movement raising $30 million to clean up 30 million pounds of trash from our oceans, rivers, and lakes.

charityIntro.title: Stop wasting tabs, start changing the world
charityIntro.subTitle: Little actions can have big results: that's why we're supporting #TeamSeas as they remove over 30M pounds of trash from our seas. With Tab for #TeamSeas, you can help clean our oceans just by opening browser tabs. It’s free and easy!

steps.text: Less trash in oceans and rivers

TFACIntro.title: The simplest way to make an impact
TFACIntro.subtitle: Turn your daily habits into a cleaner planet for all. Do good, feel good.
TFACIntro.img1Subtext: ##### Open new tabs on your browser.
TFACIntro.img2Subtext: ##### Earn money to clean up our oceans, rivers, and lakes.
TFACIntro.img3Subtext: ##### Help protect our planet and create a better world for all.

Mission.subtitleText: To make giving back easier than ever
Mission.bodyText: We believe everyone should be able to clean up our oceans. Through our partnership with #TeamSeas, you can be sure each tab you open is directly supporting [Ocean Conservancy](https://oceanconservancy.org/) and [The Ocean Cleanup](https://theoceancleanup.com/).

Financials.title: Transparent Financials
Financials.text: Every tab makes an impact. Check out how much we've raised together.

smallEndorsements.endorsement: “FANTASTIC app that lets you do a lot of good things while doing your day to day work, studying for finals, or just surfing the web!”
“Raise money for charity by browsing the internet. Perfectly executed!”
“As a person who frequently enters wikipedia holes opening 20 tabs at a time.. its great to know that my procrastination can be of some use! Great app, brilliant idea”

“It's wonderful. Unobtrusive, useful, well designed, easy to navigate, and actually pretty fun! There is no reason to not have this extension. It has not affected performance and is never an inconvenience.”
“Love that this gives me, a fool with no money, a way to donate to charity. :)”

“It's a great way to raise money for charity when you don't have a lot of money and don't have the time to go out and try to raise money on your own. Plus I can decide what charity to donate to, and do it on my own time. I love it!”

“Wonderful service that does great things for people in need, and all you have to do is click a button. So really it's a no brainer, AND as a plus their new UI is really attractive and useful as well. Way better than the default chrome new tab page. So what do you have to lose?”
“Wonderful and thoughtful idea for an extension! Helping save the world one tab at a time.”
“Awesome way to give back while browsing, with absolutely no effort on your end!”
“Amazing extension. Such an awesome idea to use ad revenue from people's new tab to donate to charity. I'd rate 6 stars if I could.”

questions.question: How does opening tabs raise money for charity?
questions.answer: Every time you open a new tab, there will be a few ads in the corner of your new tab page. These ads generate the revenue that funds our charitable impact. And the best part? It’s completely free!

questions.question: What nonprofit does Tab for #TeamSeas support?
questions.answer: Tab for #TeamSeas directly supports [#TeamSeas](https://teamseas.org), an internet-led initiative working to clean up our oceans, rivers, and lakes around the world. This initiative splits the money raised evenly between [Ocean Conservancy](https://oceanconservancy.org/) and [The Ocean Cleanup](https://theoceancleanup.com/).

questions.question: How can I find out about new updates and announcements?
questions.answer: Stay in touch with us on social media! Follow us @tabforacause on TikTok, Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook.

questions.question: This all sounds amazing! How else can I help?
questions.answer: You can donate directly to #TeamSeas by visiting [teamseas.org](https://teamseas.org)! Every dollar donated will equal a pound of trash cleaned up from the sea. Also, invite your friends and family to join in! Everybody who joins is helping to clean our seas even faster.
